com.apple.eawt.event
Interface GesturePhaseListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener, GestureListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
GestureAdapter
public interface GesturePhaseListener
extends GestureListener

Listener interface for receiving notification that a continuous gesture (like rotate or scale) has started or stopped.

Since:
Java for Mac OS X 10.5 Update 7, Java for Mac OS X 10.6 Update 2
See Also:
MagnificationListener, RotationListener, GesturePhaseEvent, GestureUtilities

Method Summary
 void gestureBegan(GesturePhaseEvent e)
          Invoked when the user has started a continuous gesture.
 void gestureEnded(GesturePhaseEvent e)
          Invoked when the user has stopped a continuous gesture.
 

Method Detail

gestureBegan

void gestureBegan(GesturePhaseEvent e)
Invoked when the user has started a continuous gesture.

Parameters:
event - representing the start of a continuous gesture.

gestureEnded

void gestureEnded(GesturePhaseEvent e)
Invoked when the user has stopped a continuous gesture.

Parameters:
event - representing the end of a continuous gesture.
